title: tournament prizes
body:
Hi , my tournament was at 24/5 and till now the prizes didnt awarded yet and today is 8/6 (means 16 days ago ) so when prizes will award to the players ? 
Oh by the way my tournaments name is ( choyuki tournament )

And another question about raising the prizes . I will do my second tournament but first I want to make sure if the prizes how will prizes raise ? 

Finally thank you for supporting my tournamet I really appreaciate it.

replies.body: We'll be able to help out, but I want to make sure you get these answers from the right people! Shoot us a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and in there let the agent know that you're looking for some help getting your tournament prizes sorted out and you'll be good to go! ^_^
